definition: an aggressive remark directed at a person like a missile and intended to have a telling effect, strike violently
details:
noun
- an aggressive remark directed at a person like a missile and intended to have a telling effect
= synonyms: barb
- a forceful impact that makes a loud noise
- the noise made by the forceful impact of two objects
- winning all or all but one of the tricks in bridge
= synonyms: sweep
verb
- strike violently
= example: strike violently
= synonyms: bang
- throw violently
= example: throw violently
= synonyms: flap down
- close violently
= example: close violently
= synonyms: bang
- dance the slam dance
= synonyms: slam dance
